original_text: When the Spirit of truth comes, he will guide you into all the truth, for he will not speak on his own authority, but whatever he hears he will speak, and he will declare to you the things that are to come.
korean_text: 그러나 진리의 성령이 오시면 그가 너희를 모든 진리 가운데로 인도하시리니 그가 스스로 말하지 않고 오직 들은 것을 말하며 장래 일을 너희에게 알리시리라

sentences.original_text: When the Spirit of truth comes,
he will guide you into all the truth,
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 너희를 모든 진리 가운데로 인도하리라,

sentences.original_text: for he will not speak on his own authority,
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그가 자기 자신으로부터 말하지 않고,

sentences.original_text: but whatever he hears he will speak,
and he will declare to you the things that are to come.
